Description: Egerton Ryerson statue toppled after rally about discovery of 215 Indigenous children's remains at residential school
Title: Statue of Canada residential schools architect toppled in Toronto
Author: Al Jazeera

Description: The actor recalls how he got into graffiti, his love of punk and sitting in the back of his teenage idol s carI grew up in Hollywood and used to work at the newsstand on Melrose, which has a younger kind of person scene This place called Posers sold Ben Sher
Title: David Arquette Marlon Brando thought I was going to give him a cold

Description: Immigrants who speak English earn more and are better accepted by Americans But the U S fails to provide sufficient free English classes for newcomers
Title: Americans Say Immigrants Should Learn English But U S Policy Makes That Hard
Author: Olga Khazan

Description: The assistant principal at Sacajawea Middle School suggested to segregate two Black twins after their mother voiced her displeasure with the school
Title: After cotton cleaning project, mom said Washington school suggested Black daughters be 'segregated'
Author: USA TODAY, Jordan Mendoza, USA TODAY

Description: From COVID to climate change to sustainable development, the G 7 makes bold promises, but does nothing concrete to solve the world's problems
Title: Project Syndicate The G 7 is as relevant as the League of Nations
Author: Jeffrey D Sachs
